name: BUCKLER 3
description:
After the Thousand War Year ended, the majority of Olives and Roses made peace with each other and stopped fighting. However, there are still some troops wandering the battlefield who reject the idea of peace and will continue to fight for their side.

Buckler 3 is a small real-time strategy game that takes place after the events of Buckler 2. You play as Venice, who was promoted to Captain and now commands a platoon of troops to fight for him. Of course, he can fight as well if needed. Strategize, command, and conquer the golden plains and fight to preserve peace & love.

This game was made in 72 hours for the hell of it.
